The code handles setting up initial conditions for playback by reparenting a node path to a playback node, aligning it at the origin with zero rotation, and starting playback from a specified record start time. It also adds a new task to manage recording or playback processes. In contrast, the else clause deals with stopping an existing task when in continuous sampling mode, particularly when refining or extending recordings, by removing tasks and reparenting nodes back to their original positions.
